CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 10, 1966, pg. 1B reads: "Talking To Santa - A visit to Toyland would not be complete without the youngsters getting a chance to talk with Santa. The three grandchildren of Mrs. Catherine Blackman having that 'all important' conversation are left to right: Cathy, Kimberly, and Serena Blackman"
TitMainTitle: Santa Claus seated in gothic chair between reindeer and Christmas trees, talking to Cathy, Kimberly, and Serena Blackman, gathered in Toyland on ninth floor of Kaufmann's Department Store
